input.sentences: it was a cold and rainy day so we had the beach to ourselves .
the clouds and mountain made for a beautiful sight .
the rain let up and the men competed with rock throwing .
my friend is so warm blooded she was the only one in a bathing suit . it was chilly !
my husband took a photo of me back at the beach house . he did a good job !
output.sentences: Dad and I went looking for shells and sea glass for Mom
Storming and unsettling day at the beach
Not finding too much,but enjoying my time with Dad,and tossing pebbles.
That little girl has a bagful of beach treasures
Mom was happy with the kelp and seaweed.
